title: Minister of Foreign Affairs paid an official visit to Republic of Guinea
text: At the invitation of Guinean Minister of Foreign Affairs, Mr Ibrahima Kalil Kaba, the Minister of Foreign Affairs, Mr Sabri Boukadoum, paid an official visit to the Republic of Guinea on March 26, 2021.

During this visit, Mr Boukadoum has been received by President of the Republic of Guinea, Professor Alpha Cond√©, to whom he conveyed the fraternal greetings of President of the Republic, Mr Abdelmadjid Tebboune, and his wish to strengthen the historic relations of friendship and cooperation between the two countries.Mr Sabri Boukadoum also had talks with his Guinean counterpart Mr Ibrahim Khalil Kaba. The discussions led to a common commitment to revitalize bilateral cooperation in various fields. The two ministers addressed the multiple challenges facing the African continent, particularly in terms of peace and security.This trip is part of the efforts to give new impetus to Algerian-Guinean relations and to strengthen high-level political dialogue on regional and international issues of common interest.
